name: UTimelineComponent
doc:
TimelineComponent holds a series of events, floats, vectors or colors with associated keyframes.
Events can be triggered at keyframes along the timeline.
Floats, vectors, and colors are interpolated between keyframes along the timeline.

methods.name: AddEvent
methods.doc: Add a callback event to the timeline

methods.name: AddInterpFloat
methods.doc: Add a float interpolation to the timeline

methods.name: AddInterpLinearColor
methods.doc: Add a linear color interpolation to the timeline

methods.name: AddInterpVector
methods.doc: Add a vector interpolation to the timeline

methods.name: GetIgnoreTimeDilation
methods.doc: Get whether to ignore time dilation.

methods.name: GetPlaybackPosition
methods.doc: Get the current playback position of the Timeline

methods.name: GetPlayRate
methods.doc: Get the current play rate for this timeline

methods.name: GetScaledTimelineLength
methods.doc: Get length of the timeline divided by the play rate

methods.name: GetTimelineLength
methods.doc: Get length of the timeline

methods.name: IsLooping
methods.doc: Get whether we are looping or not

methods.name: IsPlaying
methods.doc: Get whether this timeline is playing or not.

methods.name: IsReversing
methods.doc: Get whether we are reversing or not

methods.name: Play
methods.doc: Start playback of timeline

methods.name: PlayFromStart
methods.doc: Start playback of timeline from the start

methods.name: Reverse
methods.doc: Start playback of timeline in reverse

methods.name: ReverseFromEnd
methods.doc: Start playback of timeline in reverse from the end

methods.name: SetFloatCurve
methods.doc: Update a certain float track's curve

methods.name: SetIgnoreTimeDilation
methods.doc: Set whether to ignore time dilation.

methods.name: SetLinearColorCurve
methods.doc: Update a certain linear color track's curve

methods.name: SetLooping
methods.doc: true means we would loop, false means we should not.

methods.name: SetNewTime
methods.doc: Set the new playback position time to use

methods.name: SetPlaybackPosition
SetPlayRate
methods.doc: Sets the new play rate for this timeline

methods.name: SetTimelineFinishedFunc
methods.doc: Set the delegate to call when timeline is finished

methods.name: SetTimelineLength
methods.doc: Set length of the timeline

methods.name: SetTimelineLengthMode
methods.doc: Sets the length mode of the timeline

methods.name: SetTimelinePostUpdateFunc
methods.doc: Set the delegate to call after each timeline tick

methods.name: SetVectorCurve
methods.doc: Update a certain vector track's curve

methods.name: Stop
methods.doc: Stop playback of timeline
